channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Go passwordless when calling Azure OpenAI from Azure SQL using Managed Identities】使用托管身份从Azure SQL调用Azure OpenAi时无密码
item.description: 【Security is a significant topic today, and the ability to access a service requiring authentication without using an API key, password, or secret is a common request from those concerned about the security of a solution, which includes all of us. In today’s digital landscape, cybersecurity threats are increasingly sophisticated and frequent, making it imperative […]】安全是当今的重要主题，并且能够在不使用API​​密钥，密码或秘密的情况下访问需要身份验证的服务的能力，这是有关解决方案安全性的人的共同请求，其中包括我们所有人。在当今的数字景观中，网络安全威胁越来越复杂且频繁，因此必须进行[…]

item.title: 【Using OpenAI’s o3-mini Reasoning Model in Semantic Kernel】在语义内核中使用OpenAI的O3-Mini推理模型
item.description: 【OpenAI’s o3-mini is a newly released small reasoning model (launched January 2025) that delivers advanced problem-solving capabilities at a fraction of the cost of previous models. It excels in STEM domains (science, math, coding) while maintaining low latency and cost similar to the earlier o1-mini model. This model is also available as Azure OpenAI Service, emphasizing its efficiency gains and new features like […]】Openai的O3-Mini是一种新发布的小推理模型（启动于2025年1月），以先前型号的成本的一小部分提供了高级解决问题的能力。它在STEM域（科学，数学，编码）中表现出色，同时保持低潜伏期和与早期O1 Mini模型相似的成本。该模型也可以作为Azure OpenAi服务提供，强调了其效率的提高和新功能，例如[…]

item.title: 【Announcing Chroma DB C# SDK】宣布色度DB C＃SDK
item.description: 【Get started building AI applications using Chroma DB using the C# client SDK】使用C＃客户端SDK使用Chroma DB构建AI应用程序

item.title: 【Introducing the Adaptive Cards documentation hub and new Adaptive Cards updates】介绍自适应卡文档中心和新的自适应卡更新
item.description: 【Discover how Adaptive Cards can transform your app with rich, interactive experiences that boost productivity and streamline workflows, in our new Adaptive Cards documentation hub.】在我们的新自适应卡文档中心中，如何通过丰富的互动体验来发现自适应卡如何通过丰富的互动体验来改造您的应用程序。

item.title: 【MSVC C++ Code Analysis: Updates in Visual Studio 2022 version 17.13】MSVC C ++代码分析：Visual Studio 2022版本17.13中的更新
item.description: 【This post details the latest updates in Visual Studio 2022 version 17.13 for MSVC C++ Code Analysis. Driven by internal team insights and developer community feedback, these improvements significantly reduce false positives and strengthen production code security.】本文详细介绍了Visual Studio 2022版本17.13中的最新更新，用于MSVC C ++代码分析。在内部团队洞察力和开发人员社区反馈的推动下，这些改进大大降低了误报并增强了生产法规安全性。

item.title: 【Rust in time! Announcing the Azure SDK for Rust Beta. 🎉】及时生锈！宣布Rust Beta的Azure SDK。 🎉
item.description: 【Announcing the first beta release of the Azure SDK for Rust. This release includes libraries for Identity, Key Vault secrets & keys, Event Hubs, and Cosmos DB.】宣布Azure SDK的第一个Beta版本for Rust。该版本包括用于身份，密钥保险箱秘密和钥匙，事件中心和Cosmos DB的库。

item.title: 【C++/WinRT implementation inheritance: Notes on winrt::implements, part 1】C ++/WINRT实现继承：Winrt ::的注释，第1部分
item.description: 【A closer look at the parameters to the implements template.】仔细查看实施模板的参数。

item.title: 【Introducing Code Referencing for GitHub Copilot Completions in Visual Studio】引入Visual Studio中GitHub Copilot完成的代码参考
item.description: 【When GitHub Copilot completions (or “gray text”) pop up on your screen, have you ever wondered where does the completions come from and worried about if it matches with public code leading to license issues? If you have, we are introducing code referencing to support you and provide more transparency! We are excited to announce […]】当Github Copilot完成（或“灰色文本”）在屏幕上弹出时，您是否曾经想知道完成的位置并担心它是否与公共代码相匹配，导致了许可问题？如果您有的话，我们正在引入代码引用以支持您并提供更多透明度！我们很高兴宣布[…]

item.title: 【GitHub Copilot for Azure DevOps users】Azure Devops用户的GitHub副驾驶
item.description: 【Azure DevOps customers frequently ask us when GitHub Copilot will be available to them. What many don’t realize is that GitHub Copilot for Business is already accessible to all customers, including those using Azure DevOps. Even better, much of its powerful functionality is integrated into tools you already use, like Visual Studio and VS Code. […]】Azure Devops的客户经常问我们何时可以使用Github Copilot。许多人没有意识到的是，所有客户（包括使用Azure Devops的客户）已经可以访问企业的Github Copilot。更好的是，它的许多功能功能都集成到您已经使用的工具中，例如Visual Studio和VS代码。 […]

item.title: 【AI Agents for Beginners Course: 10 Lessons teaching you how to start building AI Agents】初学者课程的AI代理：10课，教您如何开始建立AI代理商
item.description: 【10 Lessons teaching everything you need to know to start building AI Agents Today we want to highlight the AI Agents For Beginners course that was released. 🔗https://github.com/microsoft/ai-agents-for-beginners/tree/main 🗃️There are 10 Lessons available today teaching you the basics of building AI Agents, as shown below Lesson Link Intro to AI Agents and Use Cases Link […]】10课，讲授您今天开始建立AI代理所需的一切，我们希望强调发布的初学者课程的AI代理。 🔗https：//github.com/microsoft/ai-ai-agent-for-beginners/tree/main/main🗃️There今天可以教您10课，教您构建AI代理的基础，如下所示，如下所示关联 […]
